content: this stitch is also known as crochet moss stitch granite stitch and woven stitch it is easy to do with just a little practise and after the foundation row it is a one row repeat so you soon get some rhythm it works up quite quickly it gives a lovely texture and it looks the same on both sides so a good choice for a reversible item like a blanket or scarf and it doesn t curl requires dk yarn 5mm hook gauge / gauge not critical - but i got around 20sts = 4 10cm using a 5mm hook this makes a very practical baby blanket with no holes a lovely gender-neutral choice to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓
